verses.verse: ( Victory with God) ( 100 8:1-14 ;  130 18:1-13 ;  230 108:1-13 ) לַ֭מְנַצֵּחַ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- To the tune of שׁוּשַׁ֣ן <WH7799> šū·šan “ The Lily עֵד֑וּת <WH5715> ‘ê·ḏūṯ of the Covenant. ” מִכְתָּ֖ם <WH4387> miḵ·tām A Miktam ( Miktam is probably a musical or liturgical term; used for and 56–60.) לְדָוִ֣ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ of David לְלַמֵּֽד׃ <WH3925> lə·lam·mêḏ for instruction. בְּהַצּוֹת֨וֹ׀ <WH5327> bə·haṣ·ṣō·w·ṯōw When he fought אֶ֥ת <WH853> ’eṯ - אֲרַ֣ם <WH763> ’ă·ram vvv נַהֲרַיִם֮ <WH763> na·hă·ra·yim Aram-naharaim ( That is, Mesopotamia; Aram-naharaim means Aram of the two rivers, likely the region between the Euphrates and Balih Rivers in northwestern Mesopotamia.) וְאֶת־ <WH853> wə·’eṯ- - אֲרַ֪ם <WH760> ’ă·ram vvv צ֫וֹבָ֥ה <WH760> ṣō·w·ḇāh and Aram-zobah, ( That is, the land northeast of Damascus) וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> way·yā·šāḇ returned יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> yō·w·’āḇ and Joab וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> way·yaḵ and struck down אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - אֱד֣וֹם <WH123> ’ĕ·ḏō·wm Edomites בְּגֵיא־ <WH1516> bə·ḡê- in the Valley מֶ֑לַח <WH4417> me·laḥ of Salt. שְׁנֵ֖ים <WH8147> šə·nêm 12000  עָשָׂ֣ר <WH6240> ‘ā·śār ... אָֽלֶף׃ <WH505> ’ā·lep̄ ... אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm O God; זְנַחְתָּ֣נוּ <WH2186> zə·naḥ·tā·nū You have rejected us, פְרַצְתָּ֑נוּ <WH6555> p̄ə·raṣ·tā·nū You have broken us; אָ֝נַ֗פְתָּ <WH599> ’ā·nap̄·tā You have been angry; תְּשׁ֣וֹבֵ֥ב <WH7725> tə·šō·w·ḇêḇ restore לָֽנוּ׃ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us!

הִרְעַ֣שְׁתָּה <WH7493> hir·‘aš·tāh You have shaken אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> ’e·reṣ the land פְּצַמְתָּ֑הּ <WH6480> pə·ṣam·tāh and torn it open. רְפָ֖ה <WH7495> rə·p̄āh Heal שְׁבָרֶ֣יהָ <WH7667> šə·ḇā·re·hā its fractures, כִי־ <WH3588> ḵî- for מָֽטָה׃ <WH4131> mā·ṭāh it is quaking.

הִרְאִ֣יתָה <WH7200> hir·’î·ṯāh You have shown עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> ‘am·mə·ḵā Your people קָשָׁ֑ה <WH7186> qā·šāh hardship; הִ֝שְׁקִיתָ֗נוּ <WH8248> hiš·qî·ṯā·nū You made us drink. יַ֣יִן <WH3196> ya·yin from the wine תַּרְעֵלָֽה׃ <WH8653> tar·‘ê·lāh we are staggered

נָ֘תַ֤תָּה <WH5414> nā·ṯat·tāh You have raised לִּירֵאֶ֣יךָ <WH3373> lî·rê·’e·ḵā for those who fear You, נֵּ֭ס <WH5251> nês a banner לְהִתְנוֹסֵ֑ס <WH5264> lə·hiṯ·nō·w·sês that they may flee מִ֝פְּנֵ֗י <WH6440> mip·pə·nê ... קֹ֣שֶׁט <WH7189> qō·šeṭ the bow. ( Or that it may be displayed because of truth) סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> se·lāh Selah

לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> lə·ma·‘an that יֵחָלְצ֣וּן <WH2502> yê·ḥā·lə·ṣūn may be delivered. יְדִידֶ֑יךָ <WH3039> yə·ḏî·ḏe·ḵā Your beloved הוֹשִׁ֖יעָה <WH3467> hō·wō·šî·‘āh and save us יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <WH3225> yə·mî·nə·ḵā with Your right hand, וַעֲנֵנוּ׃ <WH6030> wa·ʿă·nē·nū Respond

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm God דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> dib·ber has spoken בְּקָדְשׁ֗וֹ <WH6944> bə·qā·ḏə·šōw from His sanctuary: ( Or in His holiness) אֶ֫עְלֹ֥זָה <WH5937> ’e‘·lō·zāh “ I will triumph! אֲחַלְּקָ֥ה <WH2505> ’ă·ḥal·lə·qāh I will parcel out שְׁכֶ֑ם <WH7927> šə·ḵem Shechem וְעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> wə·‘ê·meq the Valley סֻכּ֣וֹת <WH5523> suk·kō·wṯ of Succoth. אֲמַדֵּֽד׃ <WH4058> ’ă·mad·dêḏ and apportion

לִ֤י Prep│1cs ( lî) is Mine, גִלְעָ֨ד׀ 1568 N-proper-fs ( ḡil·‘āḏ) Gilead וְלִ֬י Conj-w│Prep│1cs ( wə·lî) is Mine; מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה 4519 N-proper-ms ( mə·naš·šeh) and Manasseh וְ֭אֶפְרַיִם 669 Conj-w│N-proper-ms ( wə·’ep̄·ra·yim) Ephraim מָע֣וֹז 4581 N-msc ( mā·‘ō·wz) is My helmet רֹאשִׁ֑י 7218 N-msc│1cs ( rō·šî) ..., יְ֝הוּדָ֗ה 3063 N-proper-ms ( yə·hū·ḏāh) Judah [is] מְחֹֽקְקִי׃ 2710 V-Piel-Prtcpl-msc│1cs ( mə·ḥō·qə·qî) My scepter.

מוֹאָ֤ב׀ <WH4124> mō·w·’āḇ Moab סִ֬יר <WH5518> sîr is My washbasin רַחְצִ֗י <WH7366> raḥ·ṣî ...; עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- upon אֱ֭דוֹם <WH123> ’ĕ·ḏō·wm Edom אַשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> ’aš·lîḵ I toss נַעֲלִ֑י <WH5275> na·‘ă·lî My sandal; עָ֝לַ֗י <WH5921> ‘ā·lay over פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> pə·le·šeṯ Philistia הִתְרֹעָֽעִֽי׃ <WH7321> hiṯ·rō·‘ā·‘î I shout in triumph. ”

מִ֣י <WH4310> mî Who יֹ֭בִלֵנִי <WH2986> yō·ḇi·lê·nî will bring me עִ֣יר <WH5892> ‘îr city? מָצ֑וֹר <WH4692> mā·ṣō·wr to the fortified מִ֖י <WH4310> mî Who נָחַ֣נִי <WH5148> nā·ḥa·nî will lead me עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- to אֱדֽוֹם׃ <WH123> ’ĕ·ḏō·wm Edom?

הֲלֹֽא־ <WH3808> hă·lō- Have You not אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> ’at·tāh ... אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm O God? זְנַחְתָּ֑נוּ <WH2186> zə·naḥ·tā·nū rejected us, וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- Will You no longer תֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> ṯê·ṣê march out, אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm O God, בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6635> bə·ṣiḇ·’ō·w·ṯê·nū with our armies?

הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> hā·ḇāh- Give לָּ֣נוּ Prep│1cp ( lā·nū) us עֶזְרָ֣ת 5833 N-fsc ( ‘ez·rāṯ) aid מִצָּ֑ר 6862 Prep-m│N-ms ( miṣ·ṣār) against the enemy, וְ֝שָׁ֗וְא 7723 Conj-w│N-ms ( wə·šāw) is worthless. תְּשׁוּעַ֥ת 8668 N-fsc ( tə·šū·‘aṯ) for the help אָדָם׃ 120 N-ms ( ʾå̄·ḏå̄m) of man

בֵּֽאלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> bê·lō·hîm With God נַעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> na·‘ă·śeh- we will perform חָ֑יִל <WH2428> ḥā·yil with valor, וְ֝ה֗וּא <WH1931> wə·hū and He יָב֥וּס <WH947> yā·ḇūs will trample צָרֵֽינוּ׃ <WH6862> ṣā·rê·nū our enemies.
